q1.question: What font does Demon Slayer use?
q1.answer: Demon Slayer (Kimetsu no Yaiba) uses Blood Crow Condensed font from Iconian Fonts, designed by Daniel Zadorozny in 2009. The movie "Mugen Train" features red sans serif text similar to Impact or Ignite, while the "Demon Slayer" title uses a cleaner version of Blood Crow Condensed. Our generator includes all 11 Blood Crow variants: Regular, Italic, Condensed, Expanded, Shadow, and more.

q4.answer: Blood Crow Condensed is a truetype font from Iconian Fonts that closely matches the typography used in Demon Slayer (Kimetsu no Yaiba). It's part of the Blood Crow font family with 11 variants, perfect for creating authentic anime-style text graphics.
